text: _Team *Prospela Students (beta)* joined the shared channel_
_Team *Prospela Mentors (beta)* joined the shared channel_
_@michaelbryantvfx has joined the channel_
_@darcy513 has joined the channel_

Hey Darcy, please meet Michael your incredible E-Mentor we've been telling you about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or penny-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:
_@emma has left the channel_
_@emma has left the channel_

Hey Michael :slightly_smiling_face: I'm Darcy, I currently study at The University of Hertfordshire and i'm in my second year of being on the 3D Animation and Modelling pathway. It's semester B now so I am about to start working on some short films for a couple teams with all different styles but I would mainly like to specialise in the realistic, VFX route. My film team and I actually signed a production contract for our short early today so this is wonderful timing! I'm really excited. I mainly want to specialise in Texture and lookdev, but i'm also dabbling with rigging for one of the teams as well. It's lovely to meet you!

I spend most of my time working, watching films or playing rugby and socialising but my head is mainly in my work. I really want to try for an internship over the summer so I would love some guidance on pieces I make for my showreel eventually :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey Darcy!!! Hope you’re well! :) ahh that’s great that you know what sort of area in the industry you want to specialize in!! And congrats on the contract hehe!
Well I guess abit about me! I’m Mike and I’m a Texture/Lookev and Lighting artist at Framestore; I’ve been here about 3 years now where I began as a Runner!! :blush: I graduated from Teesside University in 2016 and coming from Wales I also love Rugby hahaha!!! Family cling to fame that my grandad played for Wales

Ah it's so nice to meet you! I applied back at the end of last year for programme so I was worried I wouldn't actually get accepted for a mentor but here we are! How long did it take you to go from runner to a main artist? The lecturers always say the transition varies in time period for everyone

Well you’re at the perfect time to start thinking about some guidance and feedback on you’re reel for applications! :)
Our department at Framestore is Texture/Lookdev/Lighting so we dabble in and out of these areas which is lovely to have I think
Being a Runner was really great I worked with like minded people who are still close friends today!!! I know maybe people say that running is awful maybe but it just depends on the company you’re at, framestore has a great program to develop! I was only running for 6 months then I got an opportunity on Paddington 2! The rest is history haha! :octopus: 
I’m unsure how best you want to communicate, whether you prefer chat or trying to setup a voice call through Discord or Skype to go through what you want to get out of the mentoring! Let me know and we can try and setup something soon! :)
I am happy on here or Discord :slightly_smiling_face: I'll just need some warning so I can setup my headset
Haha cool! Maybe we can organize a call tomorrow in the day? Just to lay out some plans for us and answer any initial questions you have!! :)
Absolutely, what time are you available? My classes don't start until next week so I am free all day
Ah awesome! Shall we say 11 tomorrow?
That's brilliant :slightly_smiling_face: 11 it is
Cool! Have a lovely evening and speak tomorrow! :octopus:
You too :smile:
